attributes.action: scrap the proposed introduction of ID cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government has no proven record of being able to manage or deliver an Information Technology project of this scale or complexity. The Home Office cannot manage its current programmes let alone a new National Identity one. The NHS IT project is over budget and overtime with many leading computer science experts doubting it can ever be made to work. 

Even if a majority of citizens felt that the aims and requirements of the project were acceptable we have no confidence that a National Identity Information technology project will meet its specifications. Our civil liberties will be compromised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
